trans-unit.target: TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000010_KOANA<tab>You are returned!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000020_KOANA<tab>Wait there, I'm coming down!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000030_KOANA<tab>Where's Lamaty'i? What happened inside the dome?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000040_KOANA<tab>So my brother is gone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000050_KOANA<tab>Yet the danger remains, and you must soon sally forth unto an unknown reality...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000060_WUKLAMAT<tab>(-Wuk Lamat-)Hey! Koana!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000070_KOANA<tab>Lamaty'i... Is this boy perhaps...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000080_WUKLAMAT<tab>This is Zoraal Ja's son, Gulool Ja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000090_KOANA<tab>I see. Time did flow differently inside the dome.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000100_KOANA<tab>If he is our brother's child, then...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000110_KOANA<tab>Gulool Ja, was it? My name is Koana, and I am Lamaty'i's brother.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000120_GULOOLJA<tab>You're her brother...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000130_WUKLAMAT<tab>You'll find none more dependable than Koana. He's family, and he'll take good care of you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000140_KOANA<tab>A pleasure to meet you, Gulool Ja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000150_GULOOLJA<tab>A pleasure to meet you too, uh...Uncle Koana.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000160_KOANA<tab>Well, I suppose I <var 1A 02 /var>am<var 1A 01 /var> your uncle...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000161_KOANA<tab>But simply Koana will do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000170_WUKLAMAT<tab>You're all confused, and little wonder. Rest assured all will be explained in due course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000180_WUKLAMAT<tab>But for now, I want to make one thing clear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000190_WUKLAMAT<tab>Gulool Ja is his own person. He had no part in his father's crimes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000200_WUKLAMAT<tab>If you have anger towards Zoraal Ja you need to express, Koana and I will gladly hear you. But you will treat Gulool Ja as you would any child─with kindness.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000210_TULIYOLLALMALE<tab>As we should. The boy's done no wrong.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000220_TULIYOLLALFEMALE<tab>Yes, the Vow of Resolve speaks true!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000230_KOANA<tab>So...will you tell me what happened? G'raha Tia has given me a summary, but I would hear your detailed accounts.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Can we walk while we chat? I want to see how things are in the city.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000250_KOANA<tab>In that case, let us make our way to Brightploom Post.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000260_KOANA<tab>Our soldiers remain on high alert, but if the threat of invasion has passed, I will bid them take a well-earned rest.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000270_YSHTOLA<tab>Electrope everywhere one turns, harboring vast amounts of lightning... This place is very much alive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000280_YSHTOLA<tab>Krile, try holding your earring to the terminal.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000290_KRILE<tab>No luck...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000300_SHALE<tab>Don't give up yet. The terminal reads the code─it might just need higher clearance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000310_SHALE<tab>Gulool Ja, would you give it a try?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000320_GULOOLJA<tab>Me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000330_SHALE<tab>If the king's authority has passed to you, then the gate ought to open.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000331_ZORAALJA<tab>(-Zoraal Ja-)But I leave behind that which I've gained by the sweat of my brow... It is yours to embrace...or spurn...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000340_GULOOLJA<tab>Uwaaah!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000350_KRILE<tab>The earring... It really was...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000360_YSHTOLA<tab>Remarkable... A voidgate is forced open with a blast of aether, and thus appears as a tear in the fabric of reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000370_YSHTOLA<tab>In contrast, this is the stitchwork of a master. Neatly hemmed, without a thread out of place. A power to be reckoned with...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000380_YSHTOLA<tab>But now isn't the time to marvel. If Gulool Ja can open the gate, then so too can Sphene close it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000390_YSHTOLA<tab>'Twould be wise to employ magicks in its defense─both to maintain its stability and ward off interference.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000391_YSHTOLA<tab>While I am able to invoke said magicks, I cannot sustain them alone. I require another to channel with me, and in unison.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000392_URIANGER<tab>For that role I do humbly volunteer myself, but even our combined efforts offer no certainty of success. Might we prevail upon the two of you to lend your support?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000393_ALPHINAUD<tab>Of course. If coordination between mages is required, few would be better suited than Alisaie and myself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000394_GRAHATIA<tab>Shall I remain as well?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000395_YSHTOLA<tab>While your presence would be welcome, I'd rather you joined the expedition team.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000396_YSHTOLA<tab>For despite our earnest efforts, the gate may well end up closed once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000397_YSHTOLA<tab>In such a situation, it may fall to those on the other side to devise a method to reconnect our worlds. A task with which you are not unfamiliar, as I recall?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000398_GRAHATIA<tab>I have faith it will not come to that, but should it, I will endeavor not to disappoint.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000510_THANCRED<tab>So, assuming Wuk Lamat, Krile, and Erenville are a given for this foray...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000511_THANCRED<tab>I'll make myself useful here by guarding those who are maintaining the gate.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000512_THANCRED<tab>Should any threats emerge, from the world beyond or otherwise, I'll deal with them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000520_ESTINIEN<tab>As will I.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000521_ESTINIEN<tab>Which leaves you free to head in there─and do what you do best.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A1_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>With you holding the fort, I know we'll be all right.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A1_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>Make sure we can return while we're still young and beautiful, eh?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A1_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm sorry...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000530_ALISAIE<tab>It's fine. Really. Mostly.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000531_ALISAIE<tab>Just don't let <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> bear the burden alone, do you hear?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000532_ALPHINAUD<tab>'Tis done. Whenever you're ready.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000533_ALISAIE<tab>We'll protect the portal. Keep it open no matter what.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000540_YSHTOLA<tab>Beyond lies an unknown reflection.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000550_YSHTOLA<tab>Short of asking an Ascian, we unfortunately have no way of identifying which one it is.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000551_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, what we do know is that it's Sphene's domain─a place where she brings back those who've been lost. So for now, why don't we call it...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000552_WUKLAMAT<tab>The unlost world!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000570_WUKLAMAT<tab>Right, let's go!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000580_ERENVILLE<tab>How to describe the sheer amazement we felt when we emerged on the other side of the portal? I fear words do not do it justice.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000590_ERENVILLE<tab>Before us was a vibrant world where the memories of the departed abided and reveled in bygone days.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000591_ERENVILLE<tab>Living Memory, or so the Endless called it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000600_ERENVILLE<tab>How they laughed and smiled as they reminisced upon unfulfilled dreams. Alive in all perceivable ways...yet knowing no loss.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000610_ERENVILLE<tab>So resplendent was every ilm of this paradise, the words rose unbidden to my lips:
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000620_ERENVILLE<tab>All this time, it was here─the city of gold.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000630_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene! Are you there?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000640_WUKLAMAT<tab>If you are, say something! We need to talk!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000650_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000660_SPHENE<tab>Hmm... That you should come here...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000670_WUKLAMAT<tab>I haven't known you long, Sphene, but I know you have a good heart. Your love for your people is proof of this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000680_WUKLAMAT<tab>I can't let you do what you're trying to do. And deep down, I don't think you want to do it either.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000690_SPHENE<tab>I want a world without suffering. A world where nothing is lost... Would that such a place existed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000700_SPHENE<tab>But the Endless only grow in number, and ever more life force is needed to sustain them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000710_SPHENE<tab>Within the barrier, we have managed to curb the cycle of rebirth these few hundred years. But we've reached the limit.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000720_SPHENE<tab>That is why I looked to interdimensional fusion. To harvest what we needed from your world.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000721_SPHENE<tab>From your people. And with the key, we <var 1A 02 /var>will<var 1A 01 /var> have it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000730_GRAHATIA<tab>And once you've plundered our world of aether, what then? Will you do the same to others?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000731_GRAHATIA<tab>All men eventually die. If you make Endless of everyone, you will never have enough aether to sustain them. You but prolong the inevitable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000740_KRILE<tab>Sphene. If you would nevertheless persist in this folly, we must stand against you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000750_KRILE<tab>For we too have people we cannot lose. Places to which our hearts belong.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000760_SPHENE<tab>Lamaty'i... I would have loved nothing more than to work hand in hand with you to tend our nations.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000770_SPHENE<tab>But fate is cruel. By the time it had brought us together, our futures had already been written.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000780_SPHENE<tab>The kind and gentle Queen Sphene was too weak to serve her people. And so she will serve them no more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000790_SPHENE<tab>I will erase all memories of the living Sphene─she who has cursed me with this soft and powerless nature.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000800_SPHENE<tab>Freed from conscience, I shall become a ruler that <var 1A 02 /var>can<var 1A 01 /var> protect Alexandria. A devourer of worlds.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000810_SPHENE<tab>When two nations cannot protect their own without doing harm to the other, there can be only one resolution. It is a hard truth...but one <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> understand, don't you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A2_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>Then let's resolve this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A2_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'll protect my world and all the others.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A2_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>This evil is not inevitable! Find another way!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000870_SPHENE<tab>I'm afraid we're out of time. The process has begun. And it cannot be stopped.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000880_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)Meso Terminal memory deletion in progress.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000890_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)Meso Terminal memory deletion in progress. Upon completion, interdimensional fusion will commence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000900_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000910_GRAHATIA<tab>Do you remember what I said to you before all this?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000920_GRAHATIA<tab>That life is a series of journeys. That you must be true to yourself, for indeed, there's no telling what awaits.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000930_GRAHATIA<tab>I don't know about you, but I certainly didn't expect to behold such sights. The future is as fluid as the water beneath us, truly.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000940_GRAHATIA<tab>Tell me, my friend. Have you ever wished to be reunited with someone who has passed away?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000950_GRAHATIA<tab>I have. I do. But I think... Above all else, I wish that they had lived.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000960_GRAHATIA<tab>If only for one more day. One more day... A joyous one, if I could choose.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000970_GRAHATIA<tab>I did all that I could to make it happen. I tried everything. Spared nothing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000980_GRAHATIA<tab>In that manner, I was able to keep some few souls out of harm's way. But so, so many were beyond my power to save.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000981_GRAHATIA<tab>What would I have done then, had I <var 1A 02 /var>this<var 1A 01 /var>...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000982_GRAHATIA<tab>And you─can you imagine yourself spending eternity here, knowing no loss?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_000990_WUKLAMAT<tab>We've switched on the circuits like you asked.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001000_CAHCIUA<tab>Thank you, everyone. Hopefully this does the trick.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001010_GRAHATIA<tab>Oh!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001020_WUKLAMAT<tab>Amazing...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001030_CANALTOWNGIRL<tab>Wow!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001040_CANALTOWNGIRL<tab>Look, Mother! Look!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001050_CANALTOWNMALE<tab>[IMPRESSED REAX “Wow”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001060_KRILE<tab>It's beautiful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001070_CAHCIUA<tab>I've never seen anything like it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001080_NAMIKKA<tab>(-???-)Wuk Lamat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001090_NAMIKKA<tab>(-???-)Where are you? Wuk Lamat!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001100_WUKLAMAT<tab>By the gods... It's...Namikka...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001110_NAMIKKA<tab>Begging your pardon, but I'm looking for a child─a small Xbr'aal girl. Have you seen her by any chance?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001120_WUKLAMAT<tab>You─you <var 1A 02 /var>are<var 1A 01 /var> Namikka, aren't you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001130_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's me, Wuk Lamat. Don't you recognize me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001140_NAMIKKA<tab>Oh, what am I to do? The child and I, we aren't related by blood, but she's as dear to me as my own...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001150_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's all right. You've found her. I'm here.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001160_NAMIKKA<tab>You...could it be?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001170_WUKLAMAT<tab>Yes, Namikka. You know these eyes, this voice. It's me, Wuk Lamat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001171_NAMIKKA<tab>[GASP OF REALIZATION]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001180_NAMIKKA<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>is<var 1A 01 /var> you! How silly of me. But if you're here, then that means...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001190_WUKLAMAT<tab>No, no. I'm still alive.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001191_NAMIKKA<tab>[RELIEVED SIGH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001200_NAMIKKA<tab>Good, good... Thank the gods for that...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001210_NAMIKKA<tab>But what power has brought us together again? This isn't a dream, is it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001220_WUKLAMAT<tab>It's not a dream.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001221_WUKLAMAT<tab>Or rather, it is a dream come true. I so wanted to hear your voice one more time.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001230_NAMIKKA<tab>Just look at you. My Wuk Lamat. Stronger and more assured than I've ever seen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001240_NAMIKKA<tab>Such hazards you must have braved and hardships endured to come so far...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001241_WUKLAMAT<tab>It was tough, but I made it thanks to my friends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001260_WUKLAMAT<tab>And to you, Namikka.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001270_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'm the person I am now because you always believed in me. Because you loved me as if I were your own daughter.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001280_WUKLAMAT<tab>Thank you, thank you. You're everything I could've asked for─the <var 1A 02 /var>best<var 1A 01 /var> mother!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001290_NAMIKKA<tab>Ahhh... I'm so glad...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001300_NAMIKKA<tab>Looking back, I've had a blessed life. And it was because I was a part of yours.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001310_NAMIKKA<tab>When I lost my child to illness, I thought I'd never know happiness again. But it rekindled in my breast the instant you smiled your little smile at me. You became my purpose. My joy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001320_WUKLAMAT<tab>You were mine too.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001330_NAMIKKA<tab>To have this chance to speak with you again and leave nothing unsaid... I know not how or why, but I am grateful. So grateful.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001340_NAMIKKA<tab>Where you must go, I cannot follow, but know that I'll always be with you. Take care of yourself. Promise me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001341_WUKLAMAT<tab>I will, Mama. I will.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001350_WUKLAMAT<tab>And one day...we'll meet again!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001360_WUKLAMAT<tab>I understand why Sphene cannot bear to let them go.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001370_WUKLAMAT<tab>But as painful as it is to part...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001380_WUKLAMAT<tab>We're meant to live and die. To let go and let others carry on in our stead. We can't cling to everything forever.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001390_WUKLAMAT<tab>Come, let's keep moving!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001400_CAHCIUA<tab>Sleep tight, everyone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001410_OTIS<tab>(-Old-fashioned Knight-)I know not who you are, but my thanks for your timely aid!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001420_YESTERLANDGIRL<tab>You're both so strong!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001430_YESTERLANDBOY<tab>That was amazing, Otis! And you too, <var 08 E905 ((miss)) ((mister)) /var>!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001440_OTIS<tab>Hahaha! Fiends such as these are naught to be feared.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001450_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well then... Dealt with it already, have you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001460_OTIS<tab>Be at ease, one and all. So long as I, Ser Otis, live and breathe, no citizen shall come to harm!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001470_WUKLAMAT<tab>Otis!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001480_WUKLAMAT<tab>Of all the people─could you really be <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> Otis?

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001490_OTIS<tab>I'm certain I do not know what you mean by <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var> Otis. I am who I am─and I should very much like to know who <var 1A 02 /var>you<var 1A 01 /var> are.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001500_WUKLAMAT<tab>You're Ser Otis Velona, lord captain of the royal knights of Alexandria, yes? We met you while searching for Gulool Ja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001510_WUKLAMAT<tab>You cooked a most delicious repast for us. Fought beside us in Solution Nine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001520_OTIS<tab>Gulool Ja...? Solution Nine...? I've never heard of such things.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001530_OTIS<tab>These events of which you speak are utterly unknown to me. As are you─I'm quite confident I would recall if we had met before!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001540_OTIS<tab>Could this be... <gasp> Villainy!? You seek to bewilder me for purposes most foul!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001550_WUKLAMAT<tab>No, no! No villainy intended, I swear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001560_WUKLAMAT<tab>(Tell me I'm not mad. This is definitely the Otis we know...right?)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A3_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>In the flesh, no less!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A3_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>An earlier version─he won't remember his time as a machine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001570_OTIS<tab>I say, what are you whispering about there!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001580_OTIS<tab>Wait─I've no time for this! I must attend to my preparations for the Founding Celebration.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001590_OTIS<tab>The children begged and begged that I perform in the marquee play, and I cannot possibly disappoint them!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001600_OTIS<tab>I take my leave of you. Good day!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001610_WUKLAMAT<tab>Founding Celebration...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001620_KRILE<tab>Well, this seems to be the right place. What's on the program, I wonder.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001630_GRAHATIA<tab>And where are the others, for that matter...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001640_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>Ladies and gentlemen, boys and girls! Tonight's performance is a story that takes place long, long ago.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001650_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>A great conflict rages over precious electrope, and the Kingdom of Alexandria has been embroiled in the chaos.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001660_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>When the royal capital comes under siege, the kingdom's valiant knights lay their lives on the line for their beloved Princess Sphene.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001670_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>I bid you keep your handkerchiefs at hand. Now, without further ado...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001680_YESTERLANDGIRL<tab><gasp> Look!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001690_YESTERLANDBOY<tab>Yeah! It's a royal knight!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001700_KRILE<tab>I beg your pardon!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001720_CAHCIUA<tab>Ahaha! What a twist!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001730_ERENVILLE<tab><sigh> Unbelievable...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001740_WUKLAMAT<tab>[SLASHING EXERT “Hah!”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001750_WUKLAMAT<tab>[SLASHING EXERT “Yaaah!”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001760_WUKLAMAT<tab>Arrrgh! I-I am killed!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001770_QUEENACTOR<tab>You must flee, all of you!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001780_YESTERLANDGIRL<tab>Princess Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001790_OTIS<tab>[SLASHING SWORD EXERT “Hyaaah!”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001800_OTIS<tab>Are you unharmed?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001810_QUEENACTOR<tab>I am thanks to you, my dearest Otis!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001820_WUKLAMAT<tab>My <var 1A 02 /var>dearest<var 1A 01 /var>...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001830_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>And so, in no small part due to the valor of the royal knights, the kingdom succeeds in repelling the invaders.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001840_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>But their jubilation proves short-lived...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001850_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>For in mad defiance, the enemy unleashes a forbidden weapon which brings about a terrible calamity. Full many lose their lives...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001860_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>The good Queen Sphene, shining vision of hope, among them...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001870_YESTERLANDTROUPE<tab>(Go to her! You're supposed to go to her!)
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001880_YESTERLANDBOY<tab>What's happening?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001890_YESTERLANDGIRL<tab>Is it over already?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001900_WUKLAMAT<tab>[CLEARING THROAT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001910_WUKLAMAT<tab>And then...though the people grieved their queen's tragic passing, guided by her legacy of compassion...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001920_WUKLAMAT<tab>Oh boy. They, um...worked hand-in-hand to overcome an age of hardship, and in time...they built a peaceful and prosperous Alexandria─a <var 1A 02 /var>new<var 1A 01 /var> Alexandria!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001930_OTIS<tab>Pray forgive me... The memories...they had me in a vice grip...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001940_WUKLAMAT<tab>All's well that ends well. I wouldn't dwell on it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001950_OTIS<tab>If I may ask... During your improvisation, you spoke of a <var 1A 02 /var>new<var 1A 01 /var> Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001960_OTIS<tab>And so I am given to wonder... Do you hail from a time after mine own?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001970_WUKLAMAT<tab>We do. And we're living people, not Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001980_OTIS<tab>My word. That I should meet the living in this place...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_001990_OTIS<tab>There is another question I dread to speak aloud. A question I couldn't bring myself to pose to newcomers out of fear of the truth...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002000_OTIS<tab>Alexandria... Does it still exist?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002010_WUKLAMAT<tab>It does. It isn't quite the place you knew, but it endures.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002020_WUKLAMAT<tab>The descendants of your people walk its streets and live each day to the fullest as proud Alexandrians.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002030_OTIS<tab>They live... We live...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002040_OTIS<tab>I-I had failed to protect my queen, but to hear that... It brings me a measure of peace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002050_WUKLAMAT<tab>You were there too, Otis. That is, an incarnation of you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002060_OTIS<tab>Of me? That's absurd...

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002070_OTIS<tab>But wait... Something comes back to me. When they were researching a means to resurrect Her Majesty─memory preservation or some such─I volunteered to be a test subject...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002080_OTIS<tab>...No, it is a fog I cannot pierce. But pray tell me, this incarnation of myself─what was he like?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A4_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>He was a proud and valiant knight of the realm.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A4_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>He was a brave soul who protected his queen to the last.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002090_WUKLAMAT<tab> That's not all. He was a father in all but name to the new king, Gulool Ja.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002100_WUKLAMAT<tab>Whatever you may have failed to do, you're the noblest of souls, Otis. And your deeds─your sacrifice─gave us hope that we sorely needed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002110_OTIS<tab>Aha... Ahahaha!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002120_OTIS<tab>'Tis a miracle. Verily, there can be no other way to describe it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002130_WUKLAMAT<tab>It is. It really is. We bear the legacy of your other self, and we'd be glad to bear yours as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002140_OTIS<tab>My, what comfort you offer! With such dependable souls to take up my shield, I may rest easy indeed!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002150_OTIS<tab>I beg you, watch over our new king.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002151_OTIS<tab>The war changed my queen. To her final moment, grief darkened her gentle countenance.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002152_OTIS<tab>I've not the honor of knowing Gulool Ja, but I pray, that for all his days, he shall have cause to smile.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002160_WUKLAMAT<tab>We'll see to it he does, Otis. I swear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002170_CAHCIUA<tab>That knight─he was the one who looked after Gulool Ja...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002180_CAHCIUA<tab>And now you follow in his footsteps.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002190_WUKLAMAT<tab>And those of others as well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002200_WUKLAMAT<tab>We've come to know how much Sphene's people loved her. How much they yearned for peace. All of this, we'll carry with us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002210_CAHCIUA<tab>I see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002220_KRILE<tab>That rather resembles arcanima, wouldn't you agree?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002230_GRAHATIA<tab>Indeed. While similar arts could have developed independently across reflections, this verges on being identical.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002240_WUKLAMAT<tab>Is something wrong?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002250_KRILE<tab>What!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002260_ALAYLA<tab>(-Milalla Woman-)Do we know each other from somewhere?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002270_ROBOR<tab>(-Milalla Man-)Come on, dear!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002280_ALAYLA<tab>(-Milalla Woman-)I'm sorry, but I must be going.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002290_KRILE<tab>Wait, please!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002301_ALAYLA<tab>(-Milalla Woman-)You're new here, I gather. It may seem strange at first, but give it time. You'll grow accustomed to it soon enough.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002310_KRILE<tab>No, no, I-I'm not... Er... Rather, I'm... Oh, what can I say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002311_KRILE<tab>Of course! This earring─do you recognize it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002320_ROBOR<tab>(-Milalla Man-)Impossible!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002330_KRILE<tab>My name is Krile. When I was a baby, I was taken from this world to another, where I grew up without knowledge of my past.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002340_KRILE<tab>I know not how much time has passed for you, and er...things may not be as you expect them to be, but...I'm here now. I've found my way back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002341_KRILE<tab>This earring, it contained a code with which I was able to reopen the gate. And I did, and I'm here, and...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002350_ROBOR<tab>(-Milalla Man-)Could it be as she claims...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002360_ALAYLA<tab>(-Milalla Woman-)She's not lying─I can tell. And there is no mistaking the earring...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002365_ALAYLA<tab>[DEEP CONTENTED SIGH]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002370_ALAYLA<tab>(-Milalla Woman-)How you've grown, my darling daughter!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002381_KRILE<tab>[OVERWHELMED EXHALE]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002390_KRILE<tab>It <var 1A 02 /var>has<var 1A 01 /var> been twenty years...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002400_ROBOR<tab>Ah, yes, names. I'm Robor, and this is Alayla...your mother.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002410_ROBOR<tab>Doubtless we have a mountain of questions for each other, but perhaps we can take this somewhere quieter?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002420_ROBOR<tab>The heatwells, for instance. There's a spot there where we can relax and chat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002430_ALAYLA<tab>Never did we imagine that such a reward awaited us. Isn't that so, Robor?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002450_ROBOR<tab>Uh...y-yes.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002460_ALAYLA<tab>Oh, don't mind your father. Like me, he's still getting used to seeing you all grown up.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002461_WUKLAMAT<tab>This is just <var 1A 02 /var>excruciating<var 1A 01 /var>...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002462_GRAHATIA<tab>Yes, well. A twenty-year blank is not so quickly filled.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002463_WUKLAMAT<tab>Even so... There's got to be something we can do...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002464_GRAHATIA<tab>You know, I think I might have an idea.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002465_KRILE<tab>Raha...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012465_GRAHATIA<tab>[BITING INTO ICE CREAM EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012466_GRAHATIA<tab>[BITING INTO ICE CREAM EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002466_WUKLAMAT<tab>What is he doing...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002467_KRILE<tab>[AMUSED LAUGHTER “Hehe... Hehehe!”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002468_KRILE<tab>[BITING INTO ICE CREAM EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002510_ALAYLA<tab>Y-You needn't force yourself...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002511_ROBOR<tab>It doesn't taste of anything to the living, surely?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002520_KRILE<tab>No, no. It's delicious.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002530_KRILE<tab>I mean it. I've never tasted anything so good.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012530_ALAYLA<tab>[HAPPY CHUCKLE “Hehe”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012531_ROBOR<tab>[BITING INTO ICE CREAM EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012532_ALAYLA<tab>[BITING INTO ICE CREAM EXERT]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002531_ALAYLA<tab>It really does taste so much better when we're all together.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002532_ROBOR<tab>Yes, indeed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002533_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'm suddenly craving dessert. How about you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002534_ALAYLA<tab>Truly, we've never felt so happy in all our lives. We don't know how to thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002535_ALAYLA<tab>But at the very least, we can give you some answers. You've risked so much and come so far for them, after all.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002540_GRAHATIA<tab>'Tis our understanding you were researching a power called interdimensional fusion. Will you tell us about it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002560_ROBOR<tab>To begin at the very beginning, there is a legend passed down by our people, the Milalla.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002570_ROBOR<tab>In the distant past, we abided in a different world. Our homeland was a paradise of eternal summer. The flowers were always in bloom.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002580_ROBOR<tab>Until, that is, a great calamity turned the very seas to ice. As those around them froze to death, our ancestors looked to a mighty relic for salvation. By its power they opened a portal, and used it to flee to another reality.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002590_ALAYLA<tab>The key is none other than that relic, and it has been in the safekeeping of our people since time immemorial.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002600_ROBOR<tab>Yes. When lightning threatened this world, we attempted to use the key to flee again like our ancestors once did.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002610_ROBOR<tab>Alas, no matter what we tried, we couldn't invoke its power. We had all but given up when Preservation approached us with an offer of partnership.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002620_ROBOR<tab>Desperate as we were, we accepted their help...only to later discover their ulterior motive: to plunder other worlds of aether.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002630_ROBOR<tab>Seeking to frustrate their plans, we defected from the order. And as their agents closed in on us, we seized control of the prototype gate and activated it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002640_ALAYLA<tab>What followed, you already know. We sent our daughter and the key through the portal, entrusting them to the men we encountered.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002650_ALAYLA<tab>You were born with an unusual gift, you see. Upon learning of it, Preservation sought to subject you to experiments.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002660_GRAHATIA<tab>An unusual gift... The Echo, I daresay.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002750_KRILE<tab>Our people, the Milalla. Are there any ways I might learn more about them?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002760_ROBOR<tab>There are─such as visiting the cavern inside the volcano. Our ancient homeland has been recreated there.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002770_ROBOR<tab>While it's intended to serve as an entertaining diversion, it ought to teach you a thing or two about our history and traditions.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002780_KRILE<tab>May we go there? Selfish though it may be, I should love to learn of my ancestors.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002781_KRILE<tab>Of them...and of the legacy my parents entrusted to me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002790_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sure, by all means. As it happens, it's on the way to our destination.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002800_WUKLAMAT<tab>Finished at last... Gods, I'm exhausted...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002810_KRILE<tab>If the legend is true, the Milalla were refugees from the Source.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002820_KRILE<tab>But what is this relic of theirs that can bridge worlds? Who made it, and to what end?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002821_ROBOR<tab>Much about the key remains shrouded in mystery.

TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002830_ROBOR<tab>By augmenting it with electrope, Preservation did succeed in opening a portal. Yet they could never grasp how they had managed to do so, much less the underlying principles of the technology.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002840_ROBOR<tab>To this day, not a single person understands the mechanics of interdimensional fusion. Let alone who imbued the key with its power, when they did so, or why.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002841_ROBOR<tab>But remember this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002850_ROBOR<tab>The key is a tool. And like all tools, in and of itself it is a force for neither good nor evil.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002860_ROBOR<tab>Once taken in hand, however, its capacity for both is made plain. In delivering one man, it may doom another─making a lie of its bearer's every good intention.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002870_ALAYLA<tab>As did Preservation, Queen Sphene seeks to wield the key in the name of those she loves.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002871_ALAYLA<tab>And, in so doing, makes her people party to the destruction of countless souls.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002880_ALAYLA<tab>We have told you all we can. To be able to share this with you at the last... It feels as though we've fulfilled our purpose.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002890_ROBOR<tab>You've come to shut down the terminal?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002900_KRILE<tab>...Yes, we have.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002910_KRILE<tab>But perhaps there's another way? One that doesn't require the terminal's deactivation...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002920_ROBOR<tab>For the longest time, we've sought a means to erase ourselves before our knowledge could be used for ill. And in you we have found it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002930_ROBOR<tab>So press on. Press on, and don't look back.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002940_KRILE<tab>I will...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002941_KRILE<tab>Um... May I ask you one last question?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002942_ALAYLA<tab>Of course, my dear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002943_KRILE<tab>The earring... Why did you leave it with me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002944_ALAYLA<tab>Because, Krile, we wanted to see you again.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002945_ALAYLA<tab>This may seem self-serving...but we wanted to leave a trace of ourselves with you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002946_ALAYLA<tab>A hint to guide you to us, so that we could live in hope.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002947_ROBOR<tab>We've dreamed of this day for so long. But now that it's become reality, we wonder if we deserve to enjoy it.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002948_ROBOR<tab>We wanted naught but the best for you, yet we've always wondered how much you might have suffered in our absence...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002950_KRILE<tab>Do not torment yourselves so. As fate would have it, you entrusted me to a good man. His name is Galuf, and he raised me as his own.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002951_KRILE<tab>What's more, I've been blessed with the finest comrades anyone could have.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002952_KRILE<tab>It's thanks to you that I am here now, hale and happy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002953_KRILE<tab>So please, be at peace. Be at peace, Mother, Father.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_012953_ALAYLA<tab>[HAPPY CHUCKLE “Hehe”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002954_ALAYLA<tab>You already have a beautiful name. But if we might call you by the one we gave you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002955_ALAYLA<tab>Maya, our dearest Maya. We love you more than life itself.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002956_KRILE<tab>Maya... M-My name...my name is Maya...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002957_WUKLAMAT<tab>Are you sure about this? You can leave the terminal to us, you know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002970_KRILE<tab>No─I must do this. Krile Maya Baldesion must press on. Press on, and...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002980_KRILE<tab>Farewell, Mother!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002981_KRILE<tab>Farewell, Father!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002982_ROBOR<tab>Farewell.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002985_CAHCIUA<tab>You know how to do it?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002986_KRILE<tab>I do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_002990_CAHCIUA<tab>If I could have everyone's attention. I know we have pressing business, but I'd like to say a few words.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003000_CAHCIUA<tab>Before I died, I had two wishes. The first was to see who my Elene'shpya would become.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003010_CAHCIUA<tab>I would say that wish has been fulfilled.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003020_CAHCIUA<tab>Indeed it has, for the boy who once shunned company has returned a <var 1A 02 /var>somewhat<var 1A 01 /var> sociable man, surrounded by wonderful friends.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003030_CAHCIUA<tab>As his mother and mentor both, I couldn't be more proud.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003040_CAHCIUA<tab>As for my second wish... That was to see all manner of nature that I had never seen before.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003050_CAHCIUA<tab>I hoped to explore every corner of the world, and there find thriving life!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003060_CAHCIUA<tab>...But I didn't even get to see all of Tural, did I? Never enough hours in a day, or days in a year. Or years in a life.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003061_KRILE<tab>Cahciua...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003070_CAHCIUA<tab>Oh, don't give me that look! Though admittedly I did go and spoil the mood. Apologies.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003080_CAHCIUA<tab>What I was so poorly trying to work up to asking was this: I want you to help me fulfill my second wish.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003090_CAHCIUA<tab>I have a good feeling about this place. There is so much here I've never seen before, I just know it!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003100_WUKLAMAT<tab>We'd love to see it with you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003110_CAHCIUA<tab>I thought you might say that! Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003120_CAHCIUA<tab>Windspath Gardens is home to a collection of flora and fauna that once thrived on the continent.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003130_CAHCIUA<tab>Like the rest of Living Memory, I haven't explored it in earnest. Controlling my vessel demanded all of my attention.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003140_CAHCIUA<tab>But at long last, I'll get to meet the creatures here. Wrap things up with a perfect little adventure. So, shall we?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003160_ERENVILLE<tab>Absolutely not.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003170_ERENVILLE<tab>We're to grant you your wish─and then what? You'll leave?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003180_ERENVILLE<tab>You cannot ask that of me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003190_CAHCIUA<tab>Oh, Elene'shpya...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003200_CAHCIUA<tab>Please understand. I just want it to end on a happy note. Not only for myself, but for all of us.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003210_CAHCIUA<tab>Better that than a sad good-bye, surely?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003220_CAHCIUA<tab>How delightful this has been! Not since my journey with the Dawnservant have I enjoyed myself so!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003230_CAHCIUA<tab>No, I'm selling it short. This was even better.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003240_CAHCIUA<tab>And that's because I was able to share this adventure with my darling boy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003250_CAHCIUA<tab>Well, this is as far as I can go. As for the rest...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003260_ERENVILLE<tab>Just stop. You're doing it again. Deciding everything by yourself and then disappearing.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003270_CAHCIUA<tab>Elene'shpya. You're my pupil, so you ought to understand.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003280_CAHCIUA<tab>Everything that lives must one day die, and that which has died isn't meant to return. This is the way of nature.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003290_CAHCIUA<tab>Mine is an unnatural existence, and I've suffered it only because I had to unmake this twisted mausoleum.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003300_CAHCIUA<tab>But now that brave souls have appeared to whom I might entrust my mission, I may finally embrace the end.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003310_CAHCIUA<tab>Can't you be happy for me?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003320_ERENVILLE<tab>How could I be <var 1A 02 /var>happy<var 1A 01 /var>?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003330_CAHCIUA<tab>...I was actually quite scared, you see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003340_CAHCIUA<tab>Scared that I'd be trapped inside the barrier forever, and denied the thrill of discovery for all my days.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003350_CAHCIUA<tab>Your coming gave me courage and comfort, Elene'shpya. More than you know.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003380_CAHCIUA<tab>And now, here I stand, unburdened and free! In this moment─the happiest of my life.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A5_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>And those feelings will live on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A5_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>This is something only you can do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003390_ERENVILLE<tab>As you wish, Mother. I'll continue what you began.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003400_ERENVILLE<tab>You were right, of course─leaving home has broadened my horizons. I've met my friends and found this place.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003410_ERENVILLE<tab>So I bid you leave your dreams with me...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003411_ERENVILLE<tab>And know─I'll go where you couldn't go and do what you couldn't do! I will!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003420_CAHCIUA<tab>Look at you, all grown up and dependable.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003430_CAHCIUA<tab>Yet with so much more ahead. A world of experiences await you─each a lesson of its own.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003440_CAHCIUA<tab>You may know failure, and burning regret...but these too shall become beacons to guide you. So come what may, hold your head high and carry on with conviction.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003450_CAHCIUA<tab>And wherever your journeys take you, keep me close to your heart, will you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003460_CAHCIUA<tab>I should like to be there, to see what I haven't seen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003470_ERENVILLE<tab>You will be, Mother.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003471_CAHCIUA<tab>Now, run along. And never forget that you're my pride and joy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003480_CAHCIUA<tab>I trust you all can handle the rest. Take care─and farewell!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003490_WUKLAMAT<tab>That makes all of them.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003500_GRAHATIA<tab>All that remains is to wait for the Meso Terminal to become vulnerable, when it's about to initiate fusion. And then we strike.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003510_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)Please be advised: we are entering the final phase of world bridging. Repeat: we are entering the final phase of world bridging.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003520_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)The aether of all residents will shortly be replenished. Be at ease─no action on your part is required.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003530_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)We thank you for your patience.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003540_WUKLAMAT<tab>Wait─it's already begun!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003550_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003560_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene! Listen to me! Please!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003570_KRILE<tab>I'm afraid she's gone...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003571_MESOTERMINAL<tab>(-Meso Terminal-)Synchronization will soon be complete.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003572_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)Synchronization complete. Data for the Endless “Sphene” has been overwritten and reconfigured. All shall be well, henceforth and in perpetuity.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003573_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)Forever will I keep and cherish my people. To that end, I have removed the remaining checks upon my authority.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003590_WUKLAMAT<tab>What the─!?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003591_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)Obstructions to the plan will be summarily removed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003592_WUKLAMAT<tab>Wait! I still haven't said─!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003593_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)Begone from my presence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003594_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)According to Eliminator's battle data, you pose the single greatest threat.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003595_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)As such, you will be erased here and now.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003596_SPHENE<tab>I am the bearer of the memories of Queen Sphene of Alexandria, and my desire to protect my people transcends all others!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003597_SPHENE<tab>If it were you, could you have found another way? With your strength, could you have held fast to that which is dear without sacrifice?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003598_SPHENE<tab>Listen to me. There's something that I need to tell you...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003599_SPHENE<tab>Is that concern? Or suspicion?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003601_SPHENE<tab>If things should take a turn for the worse...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003602_SPHENE<tab>Might...I...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A6_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>I know what I have to do.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A6_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>I'm shutting you down.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003615_SPHENE<tab>(-???-)Obstructions to the plan will be summarily removed.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003620_SPHENE<tab>The worlds have been bridged!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003630_SPHENE<tab>Be at ease, everyone. Your aether will soon be replenished.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003640_SPHENE<tab>I will suffer no interference.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003645_SPHENE<tab>Disappear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003650_WUKLAMAT<tab>Sphene!
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003660_SPHENE<tab>Your voice reached me, Lamaty'i.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003670_WUKLAMAT<tab>Is it...is it really you?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003680_SPHENE<tab>No─only in part. My memories as a living person are gone. I've been remade from those I had as an Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003690_SPHENE<tab>However...I cannot remain long, for the Meso Terminal will soon cease to function.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003700_SPHENE<tab>Once, you wanted to know me, Lamaty'i. Let my last act be to give an honest accounting.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003710_SPHENE<tab>I am, above all, sorry. For the suffering I've caused your people, and mine.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003720_SPHENE<tab>I am, ultimately, powerless against the inevitable. Unable to do aught but visit harm upon the innocent.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003730_SPHENE<tab>I am, in the end, a pitiful, selfish creature. One that should never have been created.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A7_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>You strove to make your people happy.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A7_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>You carried too many gentle memories.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A7_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>You're merely a system, created to sustain Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003740_WUKLAMAT<tab>Our nations are worlds apart, but they feel so close. Who knows what we could have accomplished had we walked together, towards a shared future.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003750_WUKLAMAT<tab>And yet...it could never be so. We each had our own to protect.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003760_SPHENE<tab>If only I had met you when I was still alive, then perhaps...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003770_SPHENE<tab>But it's no use dwelling upon a miracle that didn't happen.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003780_SPHENE<tab>Still, if there's one thing I hope you'll believe, it is this.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003785_SPHENE<tab>Brief though it was, I treasured our time together. It pains me to think that its memory will disappear along with me.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003790_SPHENE<tab>I know I have no right to ask this of you, but...when I'm gone...my people... Will you...?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003800_WUKLAMAT<tab>We'll take care of them, don't worry. And we will never forget the Endless.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003810_WUKLAMAT<tab>Neither them nor the time we spent with you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003820_WUKLAMAT<tab>So be free of your burdens, Sphene. And sleep well.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003830_SPHENE<tab>I will. Thank you.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003840_SPHENE<tab>Farewell, my beloved Alexandria.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003850_ERENVILLE<tab>So it was that the Meso Terminal fell dark, and the Endless departed for oblivion's embrace.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003860_ERENVILLE<tab>Their resplendent paradise was no more, as the memories sustaining it faded with the golden light.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003870_ERENVILLE<tab>Even so, in a way, they live on.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003871_ERENVILLE<tab>This I felt with conviction as I basked in the glow of a new dawn.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003880_ERENVILLE<tab>It remains to be seen how interdimensional fusion may have affected other reflections.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003881_ERENVILLE<tab>Krile's parents spoke of the power's capacity for both good and evil. I cannot help but wonder how Sphene's deeds will be remembered by those they touched.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003890_ERENVILLE<tab>The key that started it all was entrusted to the adventurer.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003901_ERENVILLE<tab>Such an artifact certainly lies within the Scions' realm of expertise, and no objection was raised to their retaining it for research.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003910_ERENVILLE<tab>By order of Vow Koana, the Skydeep Cenote was placed under the strict watch of the Landsguard.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003911_ERENVILLE<tab>With the mighty Bakool Ja Ja among their number, they shall not want for strength even in Zoraal Ja's absence.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003920_ERENVILLE<tab>Upon learning of their queen's passing, the people of Alexandria mourned and wept.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003930_ERENVILLE<tab>Having devoted herself to sparing them sorrow, the sight might well have moved Sphene to tears.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003940_ERENVILLE<tab>However...
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003950_ERENVILLE<tab>With Wuk Lamat carrying on her legacy, I have faith that her subjects will know joy once more.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003960_ERENVILLE<tab>As anticipated, the news that young Gulool Ja had succeeded his father as king was greeted with trepidation.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003961_ERENVILLE<tab>Reception was also mixed when Wuk Lamat came forward to name herself as the boy's guardian.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003962_ERENVILLE<tab>But the people were mollified to learn that Everkeep's systems remained operational, and there would be no impact on their lives.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003963_ERENVILLE<tab>One day, when he is older, Gulool Ja will decide for himself what manner of ruler he will be.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003964_ERENVILLE<tab>Till that day and beyond, may the path of the young king be illuminated by the love of family.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003970_ERENVILLE<tab>Meanwhile, in Tuliyollal, the people came together to hail their new Dawnservants' great victory.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003980_ERENVILLE<tab>Having honored those they lost, they turned their attention to a brighter future and celebrated for three days and nights.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_003990_ERENVILLE<tab>Not everything had been resolved, though.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004000_ERENVILLE<tab>Those who had spent thirty years in the dome struggled to resume their former lives. This and a host of other challenges remained.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004010_ERENVILLE<tab>But as the new Dawnservants continue to lead with strength and wisdom, the people may be assured that peace will endure.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004030_WUKLAMAT<tab>I'm sorry we haven't been able to talk properly. Between the reconstruction work and Papa's funeral, I've hardly had time to breathe.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004040_WUKLAMAT<tab>But, at long last, there's a lull in my duties.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004050_WUKLAMAT<tab>You've done more for us than we could ever hope to repay. Thank you, from the bottom of my heart.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004060_ERENVILLE<tab>When we left Eorzea behind to take part in the contest, none of us could have predicted what complications would follow.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004070_ERENVILLE<tab>You truly have a knack for finding trouble, my friend.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004071_ERENVILLE<tab>And you wouldn't have it any other way.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004080_WUKLAMAT<tab>So, what's next for you? Assuming you're still set on leaving the gleaner's life behind?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004090_ERENVILLE<tab>I'm off to fulfill my mother's dream, of course.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004100_ERENVILLE<tab>Like she had intended, I'll embark on a journey in search of the unknown. She's sure to enjoy my stories when we meet again in the aetherial sea.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004110_WUKLAMAT<tab>Well, well, sounds like a plan! But will you have the coin to get by?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004120_ERENVILLE<tab>I may no longer be a gleaner, but I still have contacts in Sharlayan. Contacts with deep pockets always eager to pay for information on new or rare species.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004130_WUKLAMAT<tab>Heh, you've got it all worked out.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004140_WUKLAMAT<tab>And what of you? Any new adventures in the offing?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004150_WUKLAMAT<tab>Regardless, until you're ready to leave, you're our guest here in Tuliyollal. And this time, I won't pester you to take up a post.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004160_WUKLAMAT<tab>By now, I know you well enough to know you can't stay in one place. No more than you can ignore the plight of those in need.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004170_WUKLAMAT<tab>Your path will always lead you elsewhere, and you'll continue walking it. Isn't that so?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004180_ERENVILLE<tab>An adventurer to the marrow, you are. What is it exactly that spurs you on?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_Q8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A8_000_001_NONE_VOICE<tab>My love for the star.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A8_000_002_NONE_VOICE<tab>All the sights I've yet to see.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_A8_000_003_NONE_VOICE<tab>The legacies I bear.
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004181_ERENVILLE<tab>[AMUSED CHUCKLE “Hehe”]
TEXT_VOICEMAN_07005_004182_WUKLAMAT<tab>[AMUSED CHUCKLE “Hehe”]
